title: Getting Started with Typescript
description: 3 hours interactive online training on typescript, you will learn data types, functions, clases, interfaces, modules and how you can utilize typescript config file.

title: Let's Optimize an Angular App
description: In this talk, I will share how I optimized an enterprise application in my current organization, and tools which helped me to achieve this.

title: Contributing to Angular
description: Do you want to start contributing to Angular, but wondering where and how to start, how I started my contribution. Join me to learn about it in this online meetup.
